Title: Classic Fit Denim Jeans
Short_Description: Durable denim jeans suitable for everyday wear.
Long_Description: Crafted from high-quality denim, these classic-fit jeans offer both comfort and style. They are versatile enough to be worn casually or dressed up for semi-formal occasions.

Title: Slim Fit Chino Pants
Short_Description: Comfortable and stylish pants for any occasion.
Long_Description: These slim-fit chinos are made from a stretch cotton blend for extra comfort. Ideal for work, travel, or a night out, they offer a refined look that’s perfect for smart-casual settings.

Title: Cotton Crew Neck T-Shirt
Short_Description: Soft cotton t-shirt ideal for everyday use.
Long_Description: This crew neck t-shirt is made from 100% soft cotton, providing breathable comfort all day long. Perfect for layering or wearing alone, it’s a go-to piece for any casual outfit.

Title: Oxford Leather Shoes
Short_Description: Classic and stylish footwear, ideal for both casual and formal occasions.
Long_Description: Crafted with premium leather, these oxford shoes offer a sleek design and durable build. Ideal for office wear or social events, they blend style with comfort.

Title: Cozy Fleece Hoodie
Short_Description: Cozy and comfortable sweatshirt, perfect for casual wear.
Long_Description: Stay warm and stylish with this fleece-lined hoodie, designed for both comfort and function. The relaxed fit and soft fabric make it a perfect choice for layering on cool days.

Title: Zipped Fleece Hoodie
Short_Description: Soft and versatile hoodie with zipper, great for layering.
Long_Description: This zip-up hoodie is crafted from soft fleece material, offering warmth without bulk. Perfect for gym wear or casual outings, it’s a staple for cooler weather.

Title: Relaxed Fit Denim Jeans
Short_Description: Durable denim jeans ideal for everyday wear.
Long_Description: With a relaxed fit, these jeans offer ease of movement and comfort. Made from durable denim, they’re perfect for casual outings and rugged enough for daily wear.

Title: Slip-On Loafers
Short_Description: Comfortable slip-on loafers, ideal for both casual and semi-formal settings.
Long_Description: These loafers feature a soft leather upper and cushioned insole for all-day wearability. Ideal for on-the-go individuals, they slip on easily and provide a polished look.

Title: Pullover Hoodie
Short_Description: Comfortable pullover hoodie for everyday wear.
Long_Description: This hoodie offers a relaxed fit and is made from breathable fabric. Great for lounging or outdoor activities, it’s a versatile addition to any wardrobe.

Title: V-Neck Cotton T-Shirt
Short_Description: Comfortable and versatile t-shirt with a v-neck design.
Long_Description: Made from soft, lightweight cotton, this v-neck t-shirt provides a classic look that pairs well with jeans, shorts, or casual pants. A must-have for any wardrobe.
